item.title: Cookie policy
item.description: Cookie policy What are cookies? A cookie is a piece of data from a website stored on the visitorâ€™s computer by the web browser. Typically to remember preferences, sessions (for example to keep track of whether a user is logged in or not), or track behavior (e.g. pages visited). If set by the website the user is visiting, it’s called a first-party cookie, while a cookie set by external services the website is using is called a third-party cookie.
